SELECT PUSH_ID ,TITLE ,BODY ,IMG ,URL ,REL_DT ,SEND_TARGET FROM TB_PUSH WHERE
REL_DT = DATE_FORMAT(#{nowDateTime},'%Y-%m%-%d %H:%i:%s') AND SEND_YN = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(T1.SEQ) FROM TB_PUSH_HIST T1 JOIN TB_PUSH T2 ON T1.PUSH_ID = T2.PUSH_ID WHERE T1.PUSH_ID = #{PUSH_ID} AND SENT = 'Y'

SELECT FCM_TOKEN FROM TB_USER WHERE
REG_DT < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m%-%d 04:00:00')
GROUP BY FCM_TOKEN ORDER BY MIN(REG_DT) ASC

SELECT FCM_TOKEN FROM TB_USER WHERE
REG_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m%-%d 04:00:00')
GROUP BY FCM_TOKEN ORDER BY MIN(REG_DT) ASC

SELECT FCM_TOKEN FROM TB_USER WHERE
REG_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(#{REL_DT},'%Y-%m%-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY FCM_TOKEN ORDER BY MIN(REG_DT) ASC
SELECT SEQ ,REL_DT ,MIN(NOW()- REL_DT) AS REL FROM TB_PUSH_HIST GROUP BY SEQ,REL_DT ORDER BY REL ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PUSH_HIST WHERE
REL_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND REL_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PUSH_GROUP WHERE
REG_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m%-%d 04:00:00') AND REG_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m%-%d 04:00:00')

SELECT MIN(GROUP_SEQ) FROM TB_PUSH_GROUP WHERE
REG_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m%-%d 04:00:00') AND REG_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m%-%d 04:00:00')
LIMIT 1
